fields.label: Does your business verify KYC information by means of reliable and independent documentation?
Does your business determine what steps it will take to establish whether a document has been cancelled, forged, tampered with or stolen?
fields.detail-label: Describe the steps taken to identify cancelled, forged, tampered with or stolen documents.

fields.label: Does your business determine whether it will use any authentication service that may be available in respect of a document?
Does your business determine whether, and how, to confirm information about a customer by independently initiating contact?
fields.detail-label: Describe the procedure for independently initiating contact with customers to confirm information.

fields.label: Does your business verify KYC information by means of reliable and independent electronic data?
Does your business consider the accuracy of the electronic data?
Does your business consider how secure the electronic data is?
Does your business consider how the electronic data is kept up-to-date?
Does your business consider how comprehensive the electronic data is (e.g. range of persons and period of collection)?
Does your business consider whether the data has been verified from a reliable and independent source?
Does your business consider whether the data is maintained by a government body or pursuant to legislation?
Does your business consider whether the electronic data can be additionally authenticated?
Does your business determine what reliable and independent electronic data it will use for verification?
fields.detail-label: List the reliable and independent electronic data sources used for verification.

fields.label: Does your business determine pre-defined tolerance levels for matches and errors?
fields.detail-label: Describe the pre-defined tolerance levels for matches and errors.

fields.label: Does your business have agents of customers who are individuals?
Does your business collect the full name of each agent acting for an individual customer?
Does your business collect evidence of the individual customer's authorisation of the agent?
Does your business have risk-based systems to determine whether, and to what extent, it should verify the identity of the agent?
fields.detail-label: Describe the risk-based systems and controls used to determine the extent of agent verification.

fields.label: Does your business have regard to the ML/TF risk when determining the extent of agent verification?
Does your business have agents of customers who are not acting in their capacity as an individual?
Does your business collect the full name of each individual acting as an agent for a non-individual customer?
Does your business collect evidence of the non-individual customer's authorisation of the agent?
Does your business have risk-based systems to determine the extent of verification for agents of non-individuals?
fields.detail-label: Describe the risk-based systems for agents of non-individuals.

fields.label: Does your business have regard to the ML/TF risk when determining whether to verify agents of non-individuals?

groups.title: Part 4.9: Verification from Documentation (cont.)
groups.description: Risk-based systems and controls for identifying and authenticating documents.

groups.title: Part 4.10: Verification from Electronic Data
groups.description: Systems and controls for verification using reliable and independent electronic data.

groups.title: Part 4.11: Agents of Customers
groups.description: Requirements for programs in relation to agents authorized to act on behalf of a customer.
